ොlankawa awata muhude ‘pawena awi gabadawak’ pawathwagena yamata katayuthu salasa dima sandaha rupiyal laksha 355ka mudalak thutu padurak lesa pirinamimen ha ema mudala laba ganimen allas panathe dushanaya namathi warada sidukala bawata “awant gang” sabhapathi nishshanka senadhipathi mahathata saha “rakna lanka” sabhapathi wishramika mejar janaral palitha pranandu mahathata erehi naduwa sambandhayen withthiyen idiripath kala mulika wirodhathawaya prathikshepa kala kolambaa mahadhikarana winisuru champa janaki rajarathna mahathmiya ema naduwa juni masa 04 wanida patan wibhaga kirimata ikuth da thiranaya kalaya.
ee ayata therena bhashawen katha karana, owunta gochara deshapalana wyaparayaka awashyathawa thiyenawa.
asa (chakkhu) bahira aayathanayak wana athara, ee thulin abhyantharikawa hata ganna chakkhu winynyanaya magin yam aramunak sukha washayen dakiyi.
wananthara diyaali (kaluthara kalapaye pihiti* aaraksha kere.

watahaganime hakiyawa raksha karaganna yahapath de soyaganiyi.+ 9 boru sakshikaruwek danduwamin nidahas nowanneya.+ borukarayekuta ath wanne winashayayi.+ 10 sapa pahasu jiwithayak gatha kirima modayekuta watinne natha.+ esenam, adhipathiyekuwa palanaya kirima dasayekuta kohethma watinawada?+ 11 watahaganime shakthiya athi minisekuta ikmanin kenthi noyayi.+ warada amathaka kara damima ohu sathu alankara gunangayaki.+ 12 rajekuge kopaya keshara sinhayekuge garjanawa meni.+ namuth ohu dakwana karunawa thanabima matha watena pini bindu meni.+ 13 moda puthek thama piyata karadara gena deyi.+ birindakage andadabara kadunu wahalakin nonawathi watena wahi bindu meni.+ 14 niwasa ha wasthuwa piyekugen labena urumayaki.+ eheth buddhimath birindak labenne yehowa dewigenya.+ 15 yamek alasakama nisa bara nindakata wateyi.+ kammali thanaththa badaginnen pelenneya.+ 16 aagnyawa pilipadinna thama jiwithaya rakagani.+ eheth thama hasirima gana nosalakilimath wannata maranaya ath wanneya.+ 17 duppathata karunikawa salakana thanaththa yehowa dewita nayata deyi.+ ohu dakwana salakillata dewi honda prathipala deyi.+ 18 obe puthrayawa yahamangata ganimata hakiyawa thibena thak kal ohuwa hikmawanna.+ ohuta marana danduwama labena thuru bala nositinna.+ 19 kopawishta thanaththata danduwamak windinna sidu weyi.+ ek warak ohuwa danduwamin nidahas kaloth obata nawatha nawatha ese kirimata sidu weyi.+ 20 upadeswalata sawan di hikmawima piliganna.+ ewita oba anagathayedi pragnyawantha keneku wannehiya.+ 21 miniseku boho de salasum kalath+ itu wanne yehowa dewige kamaththayi.+ 22 premaya* miniseku thula thibena itha watina gunangayaki.+ borukarayeku wenawata wada duppatheku wima hondaya.+ 23 yehowa dewi kerehi athi garubiya yamekuwa jiwanayata manga penwayi.+ ewani ayeku rathriya gewanne sathutini.+ ohuta kisi napurak sidu noweyi.+ 24 alasaya kama bandunata thama atha damuwada+ eya kata langata ganimata ohuta kammaliya.+ 25 samachchal karannata pahara denna.+ addakim adu thanaththa eya daka buddhimath wanneya.+ karana hondin therumgannata awawada karanna.

me githaya 1956 dinamina pathraya pawath wu pataka chandayaka di janapriya githaya lesa therune ehi ෙgya pada rachakaya lesa (pataka chanda 81,090) labu aananda samarakonta simasahitha impotars saha ekpotars samagamen randol kabinettuwakda, janapriya dewani chithrapataya lesa (pataka chanda 11,243) sujatha chithrapataya udesa sammanaya ke.

a.po.sa. samanya pela wibhagaye di ingrisi wishayayata adalawa lakunu laba dime di kathanaya ha shrawana kusalathawa wenuwen siyayata 30ka pramanayak labadimata rajaya thiranaya karayi.me prathipaththimaya thiranaya 2012 wasare sita kriyathmaka kerena bawa ingrisi ha thorathuru thakshanaya pilibanda janadhipathi karya sadhaka balakaye sabhapathi ha janadhipathi upadeshaka aacharya sunimal pranandu mahatha sandahan karayi.hethema me bawa kiya sitiye sabaragamuwa palath sabha shrawanagaraye pawathi uthsawayakata sahabhagi wemini.‘jiwana kusalathawak lesin ingrisi’ yana themawa yatathe ingrisi ha thorathuru thakshanaya pilibanda janadhipathi karya sadhaka balakaya dipa wyapthawa sanwidhana karana wadasatahanak ehi di pawathini.ingrisi bhashawa janasathu kirime wadapiliwela janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage niyamayen rata pura kriyathmaka kerena bawath ehi di sabaragamuwa palatha idiriyenma sitina bawath ee mahatha kiwe ya.
